pages.title: Fluid Injector
pages.text: The Fluid Injector allows you to insert the fluids needed to reprocess waste materials into the Reprocessor.$(br2) Different waste types may require different fluids.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() one, and only one, is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any vertical face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
